about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! My name is Danielle Soares and I am a Software Engineering student at the University of Brasília (UnB). Passionate about software development, I have explored areas such as web and mobile development. As an avid student, I am always looking for opportunities to improve my knowledge and explore new areas and technologies.

skill_1.title: Continuous learning
skill_1.description: With constant technological advancement, I value continuous study, not only to learn new tools, but also to improve acquired skills.

skill_2.title: Organization
skill_2.description: A well-structured system is, without a doubt, more efficient. Therefore, I prioritize planning and organization during all stages of development.

skill_3.title: Flexibility
skill_3.description: I am prepared to deal with changes and new challenges. Whether on the front-end or back-end, I am able to adapt to the needs of each project.

skill_4.title: Cooperativity
skill_4.description: Cooperativeness and communication are essential for collaborative work. I believe that teamwork promotes mutual growth.
